text: Gregory Joseph Pence (born November 14, 1956) is an American businessman and politician. He was the member for Indiana's 6th congressional district in the United States House of Representatives from January 3, 2019 to January 3, 2025. He is the older brother of former U.S. Vice President Mike Pence. On January 9, 2024, Pence announced that he would not be running for re-election to the 119th United States Congress. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Indiana Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Greg Pence
